bibl.title: Fragmentation and the Greek Medical Writers.
bibl.note: A. Medical Writers: Wholes and Fragments. - B. Computers and Physical Fragments of Medical Content; Recipes - C. Hippocratic Medical Treatises in Catalog-Format: Once a Fragment, always a Fragment. - Pp. 312-313: Edition of the Princeton portion of P. Fackelmann [ed.: Michael GRONEWALD, Einige Fackelmann-Papyri, ZPE 28 (1978) pp. 276-277 et pl. XIX f (= Marganne 81)] + P. Princ. Inv. AM 15960A (full publication forthcoming). HIPPOCRATES, Epidemics II, 6, 11-22. Provenance unknown, between the end of the second and the middle of the first centuries BCE.
bibl.seg: HANSON Ann Ellis, Fragmentation and the Greek Medical Writers.
